about_the_game:
This bonus DLC pack for the game Dating Life: Miley X Emily includes four sets of bonus materials to enjoy.
  • Dating Life Original Soundtrack with Theme Song
  • Dating Life Set of 1080p Wallpapers
  • Dating Life High Resolution Dakimakura Images
  • Dating Life PDF Guide

All four sets once installed will appear in the game directory, in a new folder called 'Bonus Materials'.
The contents of which have been included in zip archives.
detailed_description:
This bonus DLC pack for the game Dating Life: Miley X Emily includes four sets of bonus materials to enjoy.
  • Dating Life Original Soundtrack with Theme Song
  • Dating Life Set of 1080p Wallpapers
  • Dating Life High Resolution Dakimakura Images
  • Dating Life PDF Guide

All four sets once installed will appear in the game directory, in a new folder called 'Bonus Materials'.
The contents of which have been included in zip archives.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or better
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 +
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
